mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.username, t1.password, group_concat(t3.per_name) as 'permissions' from `user` t1 left join user_per t2 on t1.id = t2.user_id left join permissions t3 on t2.per_id = t3.id where t1.username = #{username} group by t1.id, t1.username
select t3.per_name from `user` t1 left join user_per t2 on t1.id = t2.user_id left join permissions t3 on t2.per_id = t3.id where t1.username = #{username}
